article.title: GT version Migrating Guide for WS A &A CAS
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating from GT2
section.para: This version is not compatible with the GT2 version of CAS because of protocol changes. To migrate to this version, this component needs to be installed completely independent of any current GT2.x CAS installs.

section.title: Migrating from GT3
section.para: This version is not compatible with the GT3 version of CAS because of protocol changes. To migrate to this version, this component needs to be installed completely independent of any current GT3 CAS installs.
